description: WWOOR watches come from Swiss brand watches with CE Certificate.Stainless Steel Durable Waterproof Case Cover Key Scratch Resistant Watch FaceImported Japanese Quartz Movement(Original Japan AL33 Seiko Quartz Movement): provide precise and accurate time keepingCalendar Date WindowShock Resistant, suitable for both outdoor and indoor activities and sports, such as running, climbing, ectClassic Business Casual Watch Design.Material: Case Material: Alloy Band Material: Stainless Steel Mirror Surface: Hard imported wear-resistant mirror (Key Scratch Resistant) Specification: Movement: Japanese quartz movement(Original Japan AL33 Seiko Quartz Movement)Band Material: Stainless SteelCase Material: Stainless SteelW/P: 50 meters water proofCase Diameter(cm): 1.57"(4cm)Case thickness(cm): 0.43"(1.1cm)Band length(cm): 8.85"(22.5cm)Band width(cm): 0.79"(2cm)Band Adjustable: BuckleWeight: about 100gPackage Included:1 x Watch1 x Watch Box1 x Instructions Adjustment Method: Step 1: Pull the crown all the way out to set the time Step 2: Pull the crown halfway out to set the dayNOTE: Please DO NOT PULL OUT the Button Underwater. Use in extreme Hot or Cold temperature will shorter watch life.Too much water contact will shorter watch life.How to adjust the band length.step 1 :Nails into the inside of the watch button to pull up a littlestep 2:With a small tool into the square hold in the fixed card in side watch,to pull up a littlestep 3:Fixed clamp is disassembled,and canbe found a small groove in the head and wach strapstep 4:Refer to the site of the wrist,move the card groove on the head,the correspond-ing alignment watch band small groove length,fixed clamp. Remeber to corre-spond to a location,to avoid the damage caused by the metal sheet.
